Title: Requires Title VI training for certain colleges or universities in New York state
Summary: Requires Title VI training for certain colleges or universities in New York state which includes the definition of antisemitism adopted by the international holocaust remembrance alliance.
LawCode: Add Art 129-C ยง6450, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to Title VI training for certain colleges or universities in New York state
